subject: Officiating (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Four veteran referees with a combined 72 seasons of N.B.A. experience have retired or moved on. One of the replacements stands 6 feet 8 inches.
snippet: Four veteran referees with a combined 72 seasons of N.B.A. experience have retired or moved on. One of the replacements stands 6 feet 8 inches.
